title: Pass The Small Tests | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Pass The Small Tests | Joel Osteen
description:
If we want to experience the blessings God has prepared for us, we have to learn to pass the small tests. When you feel God prompting you to do something, take that opportunity to show Him He can trust you. Your act of obedience will activate His power in your life. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
